title: Lost Hiker Faces Grizzly Bear: The 72-Hour Mountain Escape 🐻‍❄️

description: Alone and lost, one hiker's peaceful trip turned into a fight for survival. This is the harrowing tale of a 72-hour ordeal that pits man against nature's most formidable predator.
